definition: Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 开始悄悄作画，去中山公园写生，作花鸟册页等。

sentences.english: We were here just for these crabapple trees and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我们来中山公园其实是为了这条道，为了这些海棠花。

sentences.english: To the west of Tian An Men is Zhongshan Park.
sentences.chinese: 天安门迤西是中山公园。

sentences.english: A public gathering was held in Zhongshan Park on May Day.
sentences.chinese: 五月一日中山公园有过一次公众集会。

sentences.english: The 50-second clip is believed to be taken atZhongshan Park in Xiamen. ?
sentences.chinese: 这段50秒的视频据认为是在厦门中山公园拍摄的。

sentences.english: Mrs Wang and Alice are going toZhongshanParkunderground station.
sentences.chinese: 王太太和爱丽丝去中山公园地铁站。

sentences.english: How can I get to Zhongshan Park?You can go by the No. 12 bus.
sentences.chinese: 我怎样去中山公园？你可以坐12公共汽车。

sentences.english: Excuse me. Where is the Zhongshan Park, please?
I turn toward right from the store after the New China Bookstore arrive at the Zhongshan Park .
sentences.chinese: 我从商店向右拐经过新华书店到达中山公园。

sentences.english: How can l get to Zhongshan Park?
sentences.chinese: 我咋样能到达中山公园？

sentences.english: We are going to take the underground to Zhongshan Park.
sentences.chinese: 我们将要乘地铁去中山公园。

sentences.english: Chungshan Park. I think it's the largest in Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 中山公园，我想这是台中最大的公园。

sentences.english: Morning our family went to Zhongshan Park.
sentences.chinese: 早上，我们的家人去了中山公园。

sentences.english: Taxies took the contestants to reach the next stop, Zhongshan Park.
sentences.chinese: 大队人马再通过出租车到达下一站中山公园。

sentences.english: Does this bus stop near the Zhongshan Park station?
sentences.chinese: 这辆巴士会停在中山公园附近吗？

sentences.english: Shall we go boating in Zhongshan Park ?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以去中山公园划船吗？

definition: Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
Nanjing St., large commercial street in Shanghai
Putuo district, central Shanghai/Putuo district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang
Chuansha, name of street and park in Pudong New District 浦東新區|浦东新区[Pu3 dong1 xin1 qu1], Shanghai
